stories.text: TWIBS is a new kind of dating app where you can place pins at locations on the map and specify who would pay for the date. Then wait for people to message you or browse the map to see where other people put their TWIBS.
stories.title: Show HN: Map-based, financially-transparent, dating app
We have 48% chance of breaching 1.5°C target by 2026, says Met Office

stories.text:
Today I received an email with no subject line and no body from an email address I've never once interacted with in my life. This was marked "Important according to Google magic." Meanwhile last week an email addressed specifically to me from the CEO of the company was down in the "Everything Else" category.

Anyone else seeing this?
stories.title: Ask HN: Has Gmail's “Important” feature gotten substantially worse?
